properties.info: The Project is designed to improve the urban environment and public health for the urban and suburban residents in Colombo through improvements to wastewater management services
sectors: Water supply and other urban infrastructure and services
properties.title: GREATER COLOMBO WASTEWATER MANAGMENT PROJECT
